short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtube Shorts Controller for fast-forwarding, rewinding, and modifying playback speed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to fast forward and rewind YouTube shorts by 2.5 and 5 seconds. It also allows you to modify playback speed in increments of .25x. The current playback speed as well as timestamp are also displayed on the bottom left of the video.

Controls:
w/a/A/s/d/D

Fast Forward:
d - 2.5s
D - 5s

Rewind:
a - 2.5s
A - 5s

Playback Speed:
w - increment by .25x
s - decrement by .25x
